title: Full-Stack Software Developer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained full-stack web applications using Node.js and React.
Built RESTful APIs and database queries for efficient back-end logic.
Designed and implemented responsive, user-friendly interfaces with React.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable and maintainable software solutions.
Participated in code reviews and agile development practices to improve code quality and team productivity.

title: BIM Technician
responsibilities: Assisted in managing and coordinating building information models (BIM) to support project design and construction.
Developed automation tools using Revit API with C# to streamline repetitive tasks, reducing errors and saving time.
Collaborated with engineers and architects to improve workflow efficiency through custom software solutions.
